uesppatreon-desc: Link wiki users to their Patreon account and collect extra information.
uesppatreon-linkmsg: You have to link accounts in order for any Patreon benefits to be applied to your Wiki account. Specific reward options may also be required and entered below.
uesppatreon-appcodemsg:
Below is your free sponsor code for the UESP App to remove all ads forever!


APPCODE


This code is specific for you and your Patreon account.
uesppatreon-link: Link your UESP Wiki account to your Patreon account: [https://patreon.com '''Link Accounts''']
uesppatreon-unlink: Your accounts have been linked. [https://patreon.com '''Unlink Accounts''']
